oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memphis Boy, Elvis Presley, Signs Contract with Gleason
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Presley, Elvis; music; business; Gleason, Jackie; 1950s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An article from the Press-Scimitar announcing that Elvis had been contracted to appear four times on Jackie Gleason's Stage Show. NOTE: Clipping mounted on card stock.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Johnson, Robert
